mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FILMCATE A , TRM_CHART B , FILM_ORDER C , RECEPTION D , PATIENT E WHERE A.FILM_CD = C.FILM_CD AND C.TRM_CD = B.TRM_CD AND B.RCP_NO = D.RCP_NO AND D.PA_NO = E.PA_NO

WITH WAITVIEW AS ( SELECT RCP_NO , MAX(WAIT_NUM) AS WAIT_NUM FROM V_WAIT_HIST GROUP BY RCP_NO ) SELECT A.RCP_NO, A.WAIT_NUM, A.PA_NO, A.PA_NAME, A.DIV_CD, A.DIV_NM, A.WAITST_CD, A.WAITST_NM, TO_CHAR(A.WAIT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WAIT_DT FROM V_WAIT_HIST A INNER JOIN WAITVIEW B ON(A.RCP_NO = B.RCP_NO AND A.WAIT_NUM = B.WAIT_NUM) WHERE A.WAITST_CD = 'WS003' AND A.DIV_CD BETWEEN 'DV004' AND 'DV007'
AND A.DIV_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND A.PA_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'

WITH waitView AS ( SELECT RCP_NO, MAX(WAIT_NUM) AS WAIT_NUM FROM V_WAIT_HIST GROUP BY RCP_NO ) SELECT C.TRM_CD , A.RCP_NO , A.WAIT_NUM , A.PA_NO , A.PA_NAME , A.DIV_CD , A.DIV_NM , A.WAITST_CD , A.WAITST_NM , TO_CHAR(A.WAIT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WAIT_DT FROM V_WAIT_HIST A INNER JOIN waitView B ON(A.RCP_NO = B.RCP_NO AND A.WAIT_NUM = B.WAIT_NUM) INNER JOIN TRM_CHART C ON(B.RCP_NO = C.RCP_NO) WHERE A.WAITST_CD = 'WS003' AND A.DIV_CD BETWEEN 'DV004' AND 'DV007' AND A.PA_NO = #{paNo} ORDER BY 1
